summary: Behind the walls of a forbidden city, the only thing more dangerous than its secrets is the truth.
cast: Lavrenti Beria|Viktor Fetisov|Mikhail Gorbachev|Sergei Kirillov|Igor Kurchatov|Nadezhda Kutepova|Gregory Kuznetsov|Vladimir Kuznetsov|Alexander Litvinenko|Natalia Manzurova|Vladimir Putin|Joseph Stalin|Galina Vasilievna|Boris Yeltsin
title: City 40
